APPFORWARD Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

APPFORWARD, a servlet called by a non-web application via a browser, will clone the session if valid and redirect the web browser to the web application specified.

See test application GatewayTest.java for an example of using APPFORWARD.

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)
